attributes.action: Make fast food drive throughs mark packaging with car registration
attributes.additional_details: Neighbourhoods up and down the country are blighted by carelessly tossed fast food packaging from cars. I would like to see the packaging marked with the car registration of the person who buys the food  so that they can be traces and fined for any littering.
attributes.background: Neighbourhoods up and down the country are blighted by carelessly tossed fast food packaging from cars. I would like to see the packaging marked with the car registration of the person who buys the food  so that they can be traces and fined for any littering.
